          <title>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Lagebestimmung auf der Karte - Übungen</string>

          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Pritisnite F5 in razlagajte zraven.</string>
            <string language="en">Collection of fun games that require the knowledge of cardinal directions.</string>
